column1: PGN - mediated IL - 6 production was inhibited by a nonselective cyclooxygenase ( COX) inhibitor ( indomethacin), a selective COX - 2 inhibitor ( NS398), a PGE ( 2) ( EP2) antagonist ( AH6809), a PGE ( 4) ( EP4) antagonist ( AH23848), and a protein kinase A ( PKA) inhibitor ( KT5720), but not by a nonselective NO synthase inhibitor ( N ( G) - nitro - l - arginine methyl ester).
